channel.title: website on OWASP SAMM
channel.description: Recent content in website on OWASP SAMM

item.title: SAMM GitHub repositories
item.description: One project, many repos After the release of SAMM v2, we moved all of our GitHub content to the OWASP SAMM GitHub organization . Here, you can find all the repositories related to the SAMM project. Some of the repos you can find there are: Core Model Website SAMMwise (assessment tool) Also, don’t miss the Discussions section, where you can pitch your ideas, ask questions, and provide feedback.
